info.name: barnard59-shell
info.description: Shell command support for Barnard59 Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: Shell (after)
operations.comment: Runs the given command in a shell after all chunks have been processed.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-shell/after.js>
].

operations.label: Shell (before)
operations.comment: Runs the given command in a shell before any chunk has been processed.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-shell/begin.js>
].

operations.label: Shell
operations.comment: Runs the given command in a shell and forwards stdin and stdout.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-shell>
].
